Natural: The Beurer Facial Cleansing Brush offers deep cleansing up to 6x more effective than hand washing, with rotating brush heads suitable for sensitive skin types and thorough makeup removal, ideal for daily facial care.

Name: Braun

Natural: The Shiseido Cleansing Massage Brush enhances foaming cleansers with silky-soft, tapered bristles and silicone cushions for gentle facial massage, promoting microcirculation and skin vitality across all skin types.
